feedback.name: Page feedback
feedback.blurb: Widget that lets people provide feedback on page content

agency-footer.name: Site footer
agency-footer.blurb: Customizable links and social media icons at the bottom of all pages

branding.name: Site header
branding.blurb: The site name and logo with an optional search bar at the top of all pages

back-to-top.name: Back to top button
back-to-top.blurb: A button that lets people go back to the top of the page without scrolling

link-icon.name: Link icon
link-icon.blurb: Icons that tell people if a link goes to another website or a PDF

content-navigation.name: Page navigation
content-navigation.blurb: Links on the left side of a page that go directly to major sections of a page

pagination.name: Pagination
pagination.blurb: Splits ordered lists into numbered pages shown one at a time

menu.name: Site navigation
menu.blurb: Links and dropdown menus at the top of every page that let people move around the site

skip-to-content.name: Skip to content
skip-to-content.blurb: Accessibility feature that lets people skip the header content

accordion.name: Accordion
accordion.blurb: An expandable section of content that lets people choose what they want to see

feature-card.name: Feature card
feature-card.blurb: A highlight space on the homepage with text, image, and a button

button-grid.name: Link grid
button-grid.blurb: Grid of call-to-action buttons for top user tasks and needs

page-alert.name: Page alert
page-alert.blurb: A space for high-priority information that can include an icon and links

regulatory-outline.name: Regulatory outline
regulatory-outline.blurb: A list that replicates the ordering of government code

step-list.name: Step list
step-list.blurb: A numbered list that shows the steps in a process
